Package hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.por

Class AtomicNodePruner<S extends hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.XcfaState<?>,A extends hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.XcfaAction>

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.por.AtomicNodePruner<S,A>
Type Parameters:
S - XcfaState
A - XcfaAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodePruner<S,A>
public class AtomicNodePruner<S extends hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.XcfaState<?>,A extends hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.XcfaAction> extends Object implements NodePruner<S,A>
Prunes the given node from the given ARG if the action of its incoming edge is not part of an atomic block. Otherwise, the closest ancestor of the node is pruned for whom the above condition holds.
